title: What songs are similar to Geronimo sheppard? - Quora

response.answer_text: Songs from roughly the same era, genre and pitch: A Great Big World - KaleidoscopeOK Go - I Won’t Let You DownCapital Cities - Kangaroo CourtYoung Rising Sons - High and King of the WorldOf Monsters and Men - CrystalsTei Shi - BabyRosemary Fairweather - Good NewsSan Cisco - Too Much Time TogetherEd Sheeran - Bibia Ye YeFuneral Party - New York City Moves To The Sound of L.A.
